questions.question_text: A customer is building a high-end gaming PC and is seeking an appropriate power supply unit. Which of the following feature-sets of a power supply should be installed? (Select THREE).

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BCF
Les éléments qui doivent être installés sur un bloc d'alimentation pour un PC de jeu haut de gamme sont : un Nombre élevé de connecteurs, un Connecteur principal à 24 broches, et un Rails doubles 12V

questions.question_text: Which of the following is required during the installation of a digitizer?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
un scanner doit etre calibré au prealable. cert la derniere version du logiciel est necessaire mais je suppose que. le scanner doit etre calibré pour un fonctionnement
A digitizer is a machine that converts an analog object, image or signal into a digital (i.e. computer-readable) format.

choices.C: Must have the latest software installed
choices.A: Must be connected to the Internet

discussion.content: The answer should be B: CAT3. It is referring to a fax modem which uses a standard telephone cable (CAT3).

Selected Answer: B
le cat6 n'est pas utiliser pour le le telphone standard et le voip par contre le Cat3 fera largement l'affaire supporte mieux le standard phone et le voip

For connecting a VoIP line, always choose Cat 6 over Cat 3; Cat 3 is too outdated and won't provide the necessary bandwidth for a stable VoIP connection, while Cat 6 is the recommended standard for modern phone systems, including VoIP.

questions.question_text: A technician is troubleshooting an expansion card in a computer that allows the computer to receive faxes over a VoIP line. The line connected to the expansion card is MOST likely which of the following cable types?
For which of the following types of printers should a technician obtain a maintenance kit containing a fuser, transfer roller, and pickup rollers?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
Le kit de maintenance contenant une unité de fusion, un rouleau de transfert et des rouleaux d'entraînement est destiné aux imprimantes Laser jet

questions.question_text: Which of the following cable connection types is an example of a mini DIN?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
mini DIN est le B

The PS/2 port is a 6-pin mini-DIN connector used for connecting keyboards and mice to a PC compatible computer system. Its name comes from the IBM Personal System/2 series of personal computers, with which it was introduced in 1987
